Text:
The Internet needs
 More of you and me
 How many tongues?
 Do we speak?

Does AI know what your ancestors felt? 
 Can bots translate! 
 The taste at the tip of a tongue? 
 The fragrance of a wildflower?

The caress of wrinkled hands? 
 Tears of joy; ripples of laughter? 
 The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many hands? 
 Hold us afloat? 
 Does AI know how compassion feels?

Can bots heal? 
 More of you and me 
 How many eyes? 
 Are we the eyes you see? 
 Can bots see? 
 What is in my head? 
 Why do I cry?

Does AI eat? 
 More of you and me 
 How many bodies? 
 Should we be so lucky? 
 How many hearts? 
 Can bots feel 
 Can they read?

More of you and me 
 How many hands?
THINK: Machines canâ€™t show kindness.Humans can.
